lastSession.summary: Improved /push, /migrate, and handoff protocol in CLAUDE.md template

shipped.summary: Improve handoff protocol with concrete steps and clearer command descriptions
Ensure .claude/ tracked in git (remove from gitignore), only ignore backups
Delete completed handoffs in /push instead of archiving (shipped already tracks them)
Handle Unicode characters in session-start hook output (Windows cp1252 fix)
Add migrate step to clean up old project-level SessionStart hooks
Add /handoff --continue with parallel agent execution for fresh context
Install SessionStart hook to user-level for cross-project Windows support
Rewrite /ui with principles-based prompting, parallel agents, engagement mechanics philosophy
Improve handoff system: path headers in SessionStart hooks, principle-based push cleanup
Add handoff system for multi-session task execution with cross-platform hooks
